title: "Machine learning provides a shortcut to simulate interactions in materials for solar energy harvesting"
excerpt: "Computer simulations can help us understand interactions in materials for solar energy harvesting, but they can be extremely complex. Researchers at Argonne have simplified these modeling tasks using machine learning to speed up materials development."
